Question: Addoptics B.V. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AddOptics B.V.

Product: ARx Smartglasses

- AR displays with built-in prescription
- All-day everyday wearable smartglasses
- Personalized and fashionable glasses
- Demonstrations at AWE in Vienna and Slush in Helsinki
- Showcase at CES 2024 in Las Vegas
- Seamless integration of displays with personalized prescription
- Booth 62100 in Venetian Expo, Hall G at CES 2024
